distribution.text: Copyright 2023 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for bind fixes the following security issue: 

- CVE-2015-8000: Fix remote denial of service by misparsing incoming responses
  (bsc#958861).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: db.c in named in ISC BIND 9.x before 9.9.8-P2 and 9.10.x before 9.10.3-P2 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (REQUIRE assertion failure and daemon exit) via a malformed class attribute.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
